casebody.data:
FARM BUREAU
v.
ARMWOOD, et al. No. 99A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2007. Glenn C. Raynor, Raleigh, for Farm Bureau. Frank A. Cassiano, Jr., Greenville, John Bramble, Charles David Creech, New Bern, for Armwood, et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2007 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief: "Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (N.C. Farm Bureau) shall have up to and including the 20th day of April 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court In conference this the 16th day of March 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
